register.description: The Control Register controls the input width and height of the module.

bitfield.description: Height of the input image
Width of the input image

register.description: The CEE route config Register controls the routing of trafic through and around the EE.

bitfield.description: Enables the alignment of the Chroma and Luma for the yuv12 stream. The aligner can align the Chroma and Luma +-19 pixel clocks. 1: Enable alignment. 0: Pass Chroma and Luma as they arrive.
Enables the alignment of the Chroma and Luma for the yuv8 stream. The aligner can align the Chroma and Luma +-19 pixel clocks. 1: Enable alignment. 0: Pass Chroma and Luma as they arrive.
Selects which data stream to pass through the EE block. 0: Selects the yuv12 stream. 1: selects the yuv8 stream.
Sects the amount to shift left the incoming pixel to the EE block. 0: No Shift. 1: Shift by 2. 2: Shift by 4. 3: Reserved for future expansion.
Sects the amount to shift right the outgoing pixel from the EE block. 0: No Shift. 1: Shift by 2. 2: Shift by 4. 3: Reserved for future expansion.
Selects Luma stream for the yuv12 output. 0: Bypass EE block. 1: Use EE Luma Output.
Selects Chroma stream for the yuv12 output. 0: Bypass EE block. 1: Use EE Chroma Output.
Selects Luma stream for the yuv8 output. 0: Bypass EE block. 1: Use EE Luma Output.
Selects Chroma stream for the yuv8 output. 0: Bypass EE block. 1: Use EE Chroma Output.

register.description: The EE Enable register control the internal bypass of the EE block.

bitfield.description: The EE Enable register control the internal bypass of the EE block.

register.description: The YEE Shift register controls the down shift length of high pass filter (HPF) in edge enhancer

bitfield.description: The down shift length of high pass filter (HPF) in edge enhancer takes the output of the 5x5 HPF and shifts it by the selected amount. Only values 0-31 are valid.

register.description: The YEE Coefficient Row 0 Column 0 defines the Multiplier coefficient in HPF

bitfield.description: The Multiplier coefficient for the given row/col is used in the HPF and can range from -512 to 511.

register.description: The YEE Coefficient Row 0 Column 1 defines the Multiplier coefficient in HPF

bitfield.description: The Multiplier coefficient for the given row/col is used in the HPF and can range from -512 to 511.

register.description: The YEE Coefficient Row 0 Column 2 defines the Multiplier coefficient in HPF

bitfield.description: The Multiplier coefficient for the given row/col is used in the HPF and can range from -512 to 511.

register.description: The YEE Coefficient Row 1 Column 0 defines the Multiplier coefficient in HPF

bitfield.description: The Multiplier coefficient for the given row/col is used in the HPF and can range from -512 to 511.

register.description: The YEE Coefficient Row 1 Column 1 defines the Multiplier coefficient in HPF

bitfield.description: The Multiplier coefficient for the given row/col is used in the HPF and can range from -512 to 511.

register.description: The YEE Coefficient Row 1 Column 2 defines the Multiplier coefficient in HPF

bitfield.description: The Multiplier coefficient for the given row/col is used in the HPF and can range from -512 to 511.

register.description: The YEE Coefficient Row 2 Column 0 defines the Multiplier coefficient in HPF

bitfield.description: The Multiplier coefficient for the given row/col is used in the HPF and can range from -512 to 511.

register.description: The YEE Coefficient Row 2 Column 1 defines the Multiplier coefficient in HPF

bitfield.description: The Multiplier coefficient for the given row/col is used in the HPF and can range from -512 to 511.

register.description: The YEE Coefficient Row 2 Column 2 defines the Multiplier coefficient in HPF

bitfield.description: The Multiplier coefficient for the given row/col is used in the HPF and can range from -512 to 511.

register.description: The Edge Enhancer lower threshold before referring to LUT.

bitfield.description: The yee_e_thr is the Shrink Threshold before the LUT, scaled by 16x.

register.description: The Merge selects the output that is added to the target pixel.

bitfield.description: The yee_mergesel selects either the sum of the LUT and edge sharpener output of the max of the absolute values from both. 0: selects the SUM. 1: elects the absolute value max.

register.description: The Halo selects Halo reduction mode.

bitfield.description: The yes_e_hal selects whether the 3x3 gradients is used to clip the target pixel. 0: Halo reduction off. 1: Halo reduction on.

register.description: The Edge sharpener, gain value on gradient

bitfield.description: Sets the Gradient Gain value

register.description: The Edge sharpener gain

bitfield.description: Sets the Edge sharpener Band-pass filter gain

register.description: The Edge sharpener HPF value lower limit

bitfield.description: Sets the Edge sharpener HPF value lower limit shrink threshold

register.description: The Edge sharpener HPF value upper limit (after 6 bit right shift)

bitfield.description: Sets the Edge sharpener HPF value upper limit (after 6 bit right shift) clip threshold

register.description: The Edge sharpener, offset value on gradient

bitfield.description: Sets the Edge sharpener offset value on gradient

register.description: Status/clear register for flexee interrupts

bitfield.description: status/clear for EE horizontal aligner yuv8 overflow error indicates that the luma and chroma line starts were not within hardware synchronization limits. Write 1 to clear, write 0 has no effect.
status/clear for EE horizontal aligner yuv12 overflow error indicates that the luma and chroma line starts were not within hardware synchronization limits. Write 1 to clear, write 0 has no effect.
status/clear for error on line array, set when software accesses EE pixel array during active frame causing potential frame corruption. Write 1 to clear, write 0 has no effect.
status/clear for error on EE LUT cfg, set when software accesses EE LUT during active frame causing potential frame corruption. Write 1 to clear, write 0 has no effect.

register.description: Selector for which line memory is read or written

bitfield.description: Selects which line is read or written from the line memory array. The current line is updated at Start-Of-Line, so if the memory is read during a line that is being written, the data for the current_line will contain the new data for this current_line as well as old data from current_line - 5 that has not been overridden yet. If the current_line is the first few lines of a frame, the other lines will be from the end of the previous frame. '0' = current line written, '1' = current line - 1, 2 = current line - 2, 3 = current line - 3, 4 = current side band line. 5 = current side band line - 1.

register.description: The host will program the EE LUT RAM so that the pixels are translated from 14 bit to 12 bit using LUT entries.

bitfield.description: The lower EE LUT entry n+1.
The lower EE LUT entry n+0.

register.description: The pixel RAM contains the array of 12 bit pixels stored and used by the CFA logic. Pixels are 16 bit aligned. Pixels can only be written two at a time.

bitfield.description: The 12 bit pixel data for the selected line upper pixel 'n+1'
The 12 bit pixel data for the selected line lower pixel 'n'
